title: Emmerdale star Michelle Hardwick splits from wife Rosie Nicholl after less than a year of marriage after ‘drifting apart’
text:
Comments Emmerdale actress Michelle Hardwick has split from her wife Rosie Nicholl after a year of marriage. 
The soap star – who tied the knot with Rosie in April 2015 – revealed the pair called time on their relationship last year because they had started to drift apart. ITV 2 Emmerdale actress Michelle Hardwick (left) has split from her wife Rosie Nicholl after a year of marriage 
Speaking to the Daily Star , she said: “Unfortunately Rosie and I did split last year but are still good friends. It was one of those things where we did drift apart. It’s just really sad and one of those things that happens. 
“We still have our dogs which we’ll share and nobody else was involved, it just happened and it was a mutual decision. I don’t know how else to explain it. I grew out of love and she became more of my best friend. It was like we were living as friends, not a married couple.” 
Michelle added: ” We’re still living together, just in separate rooms while the divorce goes through but it’s underway. It has been the hardest thing either of us has ever been through. 
“Coming to the decision to split was very difficult. But I believe it will be for the best in the long run.” PA:Press Association The soap star revealed the pair called time on their relationship last year because they had started to drift apart A year ago today this happened! Happy anniversary to my beautiful wife ❤️ pic.twitter.com/o4DoGHvPu6 
— Michelle Hardwick (@ChelleHardwick) April 4, 2016 
The 40-year-old actress – who plays Vanessa Woodfield – also revealed that the former couple had already decided that Roise would keep their pet dogs Harley and Jess due to Michelle’s work commitments. 
She also chose to keep news of the split secret from her cast mates until recent months because did not want to have to face questions about it while trying to focus on work.
